程序包 com.jieli.stream.dv.gdxxx.ui.widget.coverflow

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CoverFlowLayoutManger.OnSelected
    选中监听接口
    GLCoverFlowView.OnCoverFlowListener  
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CoverFlowLayoutManger
    Cover Flow布局类 通过重写LayoutManger布局方法CoverFlowLayoutManger.onLayoutChildren(RecyclerView.Recycler, RecyclerView.State) 对Item进行布局，并对超出屏幕的Item进行回收 通过重写LayoutManger中的CoverFlowLayoutManger.scrollHorizontallyBy(int, RecyclerView.Recycler, RecyclerView.State) 进行水平滚动处理
    CoverFlowLayoutManger.Builder  
    DataCache<K,E>  
    GLCoverFlowView  
    GLCoverFlowView.CoverFlowRecord  
    RecyclerCoverFlow
    继承RecyclerView重写RecyclerCoverFlow.getChildDrawingOrder(int, int)对Item的绘制顺序进行控制
